column1: short of a length outside off, left alone...carries gently through to Watling
full and straight, at off stump, perhaps just a hint of swing, played to the off side
good cricket, it's a good full delivery, hint of shape, pushed solidly on the front foot to the right of mid-off where Williamson fields well

through him! What a start. The stuff that dreams are made of. Boult gets it spot on, full and straight, shapes back into the right hander and goes through the gap between bat and pad as he drives. Burns caught flat-footed. That's perfect for New Zealand
beats the edge! This one is full, pushed across outside off, he's driving well away from his body without moving the feet. That's tension
and again! Two in a row as Boult beats the outside edge, another very loose shot from Labuschagne as he aims a booming drive against the moving ball.
over the wicket, full at off stump, shapes back in and is pushed firmly to mid-off
full at middle and off, defended on the front foot
fraction too straight, clipped off the pads backward of square
back of a length outside off, left alone
perfect spot, good length at off stump, hint of away swing, takes a thickish outside edge but he plays with soft hands and it runs to fourth slip
terrific shot, a half volley outside off, 131kph, and it's driven confidently through mid-off
late swing here and Warner gets squared up, aiming to work a full delivery to the leg side and it squirts through backward point
beaten! That's a good one, full outside off, big swing away, lures Warner it playing well away from his body
full at off stump, runs off the face through backward point, was more in control on this occasion
full outside off, 133kph, left alone...early signs suggest no great pace in the pitch
full and straight, pushed firmly back at Boult who gets down quickly in his follow through
angles this one down the leg side at 132kph
full outside off, nice away swing, left alone
full at middle and off, 134kph, defended
the first bouncer of the day and Labuschagne isn't entirely convincing in getting his head of out the line
edged! Doesn't carry to fourth slip. He did well not to push too hard, a nice outswinger on a good length at off stump
short of a length outside off, left alone
wider outside off, a comfortable leave
full at middle and off, defended on the front foot followed by a loud call of 'wait on, wait on'
short of a length, straighter, defended down off the splice...a tester for that left thumb
angled down the leg side
back on a full length outside off, 134kph, he's across to off stump and leaves it alone
full at off stump, squeezes this off a thick inside edge into his pads...this one held its line rather than swinging away
very nicely played, leans forward into a full delivery and punches it sweetly through the off side
that's a beauty! Gee, I though he'd nicked that. Length ball at off stump, turns him around and beats the edge. Maybe clipped the back leg?
touch fuller, 132kph, at off stump, slicing slightly across this as he comes forward and drives
that's better, solidly defended on the front foot, head over the ball
onto the front foot as Southee keeps it full at off stump, trying to play it as late as he can
full outside off, 135kph, left alone with his trademark swish away of the bat
fuller, and a touch wider outside off, left alone
defended square into the off side
another confident drive from Warner, quickly onto the front foot and punches past Boult's right hand and straight of mid-off. He looks in good order.
back of a length at off stump, 132kph, defended to the on side
too straight, started on leg stump, short of a length, takes the thigh pad towards long leg
shoulders arms! This shapes back in, short of a length, Labuschagne leaves it alone and is taken high on the back leg. Lovely bowling
full, very wide outside off, steered away through backward point as he opens the face
angled across outside off, 134kph, left alone
short of a length, pushed square into the off side, Santner is quickly onto it and creates some confusion over the chance of a second
full at off stump, defended on the front foot
wider outside off, 129kph, through to the keeper
beaten! That's a good one. In the channel outside off, shapes away and climbs very nicely past the edge
touch fuller, on off stump, defended off the middle of the bat to the off side
full at off stump, 132kph, comes forward and defends
very full outside off, driven to the right of mid-off
gets right across to off stump and defends to the off side, his back leg comes right around
pushed across full outside off, left alone
good length outside off, lets this go through and it scuttles to Watling
full at the stumps, straightens the line, hint of inswing, defended to the leg side
round the wicket, full outside off, left alone
gets across the crease and punches a full delivery back to the bowler
decent ball and well played, it's an inswinger that hoops back at Warner but he's a very good position and pushes it straight of mid-on
short of a length at off stump, 137kph, defended on the back foot
touch fuller at off stump, 132kph, defended to the off side
full outside off, a well-judged leave
starts with a low full toss which is punched firmly back to de Grandhomme who does well to get a hand on it
change of angle, round the wicket, works a straight ball to midwicket
full, swings back in quite sharply, flicked wide of midwicket
very full, 126kph, at off stump, defended to the on side
he's batting out of his crease then gets a good stride forward and drives to mid-on
across the crease and gets well forward, pushes to mid-off
round the wicket, pushed towards mid-off who gets across to prevent any runs
full, very wide outside off, left alone
full outside off, an inswinger to Warner, driven towards midwicket and there's a rare poor piece of fielding
his feet a little caught in the crease this time, he's reaching out for a full delivery
full at off stump, defended to mid-on
good length outside off, shapes back but is wide enough to comfortably leave
full at off stump, big stride forward and defends
full, angled down the leg side
good length outside off, left alone
lovely delivery, back of a length, and a rare occasion of Labuschagne being in two minds whether to play or leave
fuller, outside off, 126kph, comes forward and drives to mid-off
forward again and drives sweetly to mid-off
131kph, good length, shaping in, he defends solidly on the front foot
130kph, bouncer, he's surprised, but he drops the knees to sway under it
132kph, beaten by a beauty, length, angling in, threatening to swing but it seams away a touch and beats the edge. He did well to keep bat next to pad and not follow
132kph, wobbling wide of off, he's not tempted to play
132kph, swinging but into the middle of the bat! He caresses a cover drive of the highest quality! The timing was superb. Too full despite the shape.
132kph, back of a length, he's back and forcing this through point, he takes on Santner's throw trying for two and has to dive! The throw was high and wide of the stumps
127kph, full angling down leg, he glances neatly fine, CdG has a big chase from fine leg and he gets there to haul it in
129kph, good length, angled across, trying to shape back but he leaves
good length wide of off, he leaves alone
130kph, length way down leg, he tries to glance and probably was fortunate not to catch up with it
129kph, good length, angled across wide of off, he leaves
130kph, fuller on middle, he clips this neatly off the pads wide of mid on
122kph, fuller outswinger on off, he drives, mistiming to mid on
122kph, good length outswinger on off, he defends on the front foot
125kph, back of a length on off, he's shuffling across to knock this to the gap at midwicket
123kph, wobbling way wide of off, he leaves
124kph, full inswinger, he checks a drive to the man at mid off who is very deep
125kph, fuller on off, he drives, dragging it straight of mid on, Boult whips across and fields and shies but misses. Labuschagne was stretched but he was home
130kph, fuller, shaping in a touch, he mistimes a drive dragging it to midwicket
good length, 129kph, shaping in a touch to off, he pushes firmly to mid on
129kph, bouncer, outside off, angled across, he shaped to pull but bailed out
131kph, back of a length on off, he defends from the crease to midwicket
129kph, good length, pushed wide of off, he leaves
134kph, good length, wide of off, he leaves
125kph, full and wide of off, hooping back but not enough to ask Warner to play
fuller inswinger, 124kph, he's tempted to drive, gets a thick inside edge behind square for a single
walks down a touch, 126kph, on leg, he tucks it off the pads behind square
125kph, good length wide of off, he leaves
124kph, play and miss prodding at a wide one that wobbles off the seam!
123kph, beaten again prodding off the back foot as it's angled in and nibbles away
fuller on off, he drives firmly straight back at the bowler
fuller on leg, swinging in, he clips this off the his pads to midwicket
131kph, fuller, hint of shape, he pushes off the outside half of the bat to point
132kph, good length, fifth stump line, he leaves watchfully
132kph, angled into the thigh pad, it runs away to square leg
131kph, fuller angled across and he leaves
124kph, wide half volley and met through cover-point! Easy square drive and he thumped it to the rope
125kph, shorter, width again, he cuts neatly behind point, not quite timed but he gets two
127kph, back of a length, on off, he is back and defending
124kph, fuller inswinger, he clips this to catching midwicket
123kph, short and wide, he reaches out and slaps a cut off the toe of the bat through cover-point, didn't time it but they get three
126kph, back of a length on off, he defends on the front foot

132kph, length ball spits at him and hits him in the body! Hits him flush in the chest after clipping the shoulder of the bat! That didn't tickle. It nipped sharply off the seam as he tried to work it to leg
129kph, angled down the leg side
133kph, back of a length, he's squared up a touch defending off the back foot to point
132kph, good length, top of off, he defends from the crease
133kph, shorter wide of off, he's up on the toes pushing behind point off the open face
133kph, back of a length outswinger, he's squared up and defending to cover
131kph, full and wide, he square drives through a vacant point with a control, didn't over hit it and picks up three

caught at second slip! Brilliant catch from Southee. 133kph, very full outside off, he drives hard, it just swung a touch late, he edges and it flies to the right of Southee at second, he sticks the right hand out, it bounces out and he holds the rebound diving backwards. Superb catch.
back of a length, 135kph, angled across, he's back and across to defend
134kph, bouncer, outside off, he ducks under it
134kph, bouncer, over middle, he ducks under
134kph, fuller, he works this wide of a close mid on and takes him out, the throw is miles wide but it would have been close
133kph, angled wide off, extravagant movement from Smith to go across and leave
137kph, back and across defending to mid on
136kph, bouncer, he ducks easily as it is very high
another bouncer over middle and he ducks
135kph, fuller outside off, he's hanging back and driving firmly back to Boult
134kph, fuller angled wide of off, he leaves
133kph, full and well wide of off, he leaves
134kph, fuller outside off, he drives to mid off
134kph, bouncer, he tries to pull and mistimes it, checking the shot, bunting it down forward of square
133kph, bouncer, outside off, wasn't that short, he ducked early taking his eye off it
132kph, bouncer, high over off, very high
131kph, short ball rears at him, he fends off the gloves from in front of his face! He was surprised by that one
136kph, an edge defending on the front foot and it runs along the ground to the third man rope! Soft hands there
134kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and across, he defends
135kph, angled down the leg side and he leaves
137kph, back of a length, fifth stump line, he leaves
139kph, back of a length on off, he's back and defending
138kph, fuller, wider of off, he leaves
137kph, shorter length, he lets it hit him and it comes off the backside and runs fine, they run and it's called dead ball. Was he trying to evade? You could make a case
excellent knuckle ball slower ball, shapes in, he whips to forward square
135kph, yorker at the base of middle, he drops the bat down well to defend
137kph, back of a length, outside off, he's up on his toes and defending to cover-point
138kph, shorter, he leans inside it, it hits his back and runs fine, they run and called dead ball again!
136kph, short ball, rears and pops off the shoulder of the bat and falls safe on the off side!

huge appeal for lbw first ball! Slides on from round the wicket, Labuschagne playing forward, taken on the front pad. Very, very close but no review called. Replay shows too much bounce, it was going over.
short of a length, this spins and bounces...well, well
full at off stump, whipped firmly to mid-on
leans forward and defends
tucked off the hip towards short leg
good length, Labuschagne plays back to a reasonably full delivery, defends to the on side. Good over from Santner
back of a length at off stump, Smith moves across his crease and it takes the splice of the bat as he defends
great shot! Latches onto a full delivery outside off and rifles it straight down the ground
a short ball angled down the leg side, Smith allows it to go through
pushed down the leg side, Smith walks inside the line
wide outside off, left alone
takes on the short ball! And he plays it superbly, gets over the top if it, rolls the wrists, and pulls through square leg
round the wicket, angled in full at off stump, driven to mid-on
good length, whipped off the pads straight to the men at leg slip
back of a length at off stump, defended
fuller, outside off, he allows it to go through
short at leg stump, he gets inside the line and pulls to long leg, in good control
over the wicket, banged in very short and he ducks underneath
short of a length outside off, left alone
good delivery, on a length just outside off, a well-judged leave
back of a length, this one nips back a touch as Labuschagne leaves alone
angled into the pads, nice piece of timing as he works through square leg
short and wide outside off, not a great delivery, carries at ankle height to Watling
back on off stump, good length, played with a closed face to the leg side
short at the body, he swivels on the pull and keeps it down towards the deep leg gully
short of a length outside off, 134kph, defended on the back foot
fuller delivery, Labuschagne a little caught on the crease and it takes an inside edge into the front pad
another short one, this time pulled to the forward square leg
short of a length at off stump, 136kph, defended to the on side off the back foot
full, 137kph, outside off and left alone...the game of cat and mouse continues

gone with a direct hit! Labuschagne was nowhere. Smith drove firmly to mid-off and started for the run, Labuschagne came a long way and was then sent back. Williamson can't hit. That could be a huge moment
good length outside off, defended
back and across, right outside off stump, plays a back-of-a-length delivery to midwicket
short ball outside off, over the top and pulls to long leg
full outside off, nicely bowled, leaves it alone at the last moment
left alone outside off
short, down the leg side, Smith moves inside the line
short again, down the leg side, Smith allows it through
fuller, angled across outside off, 132kph, left alone
short of a length, straight, defended down in front of short leg
short of a length at off stump, defended to the off side towards silly point
short on leg stump, Smith plays at this time, pulls to the leg gully
good length at off stump, 133kph, this one shades back in a fraction, defended to mid-on
full outside off, 131kph, Labuschagne comes across the crease and then leaves alone
wider outside off, through to the keeper
back of a length outside off, 130kph, dangling the carrot and Labuschagne watches it go through
an appeal for lbw as Labuschagne shoulders arms to a straighter delivery, looked far too high as it took the back leg. That's 100 balls for Marnus
back of a length at middle and off, defended. This is tight stuff
short at off stump, takes the splice but Smith is able to keep it down in front of silly point
angled across outside off, 132kph, short, he drops his hands
full and straight, clipped off the pads and Blundell makes a tumbling save at backward square leg
round the wicket, good length at off stump, defended and Wagner tumbles down in his follow through
fuller, a slower ball at 109kph, this swings back a touch and is tucked to leg gully
gets this short ball away, threads the gap behind square on the leg side, de Grandhomme gets the boot on it running around from long leg
a tight run! Back of a length, tucked to the leg side and Smith has to get a move on
wide outside off, left alone
too straight, gets inside the line and tucks to long leg
wide outside off, 121kph, floats through to the keeper
back of a length at off stump, defended
oh boy, it's a direct hit from fine leg by Wagner! He's just made it, Labuschagne has to get the full stretch out but he's safe after pushing hard for the second
round the wicket, short of a length, defended to the on side
sees this short one early, rolls the wrists and pulls well in front of square...they make it an all-run four
pulls again, short at the body, sends it to deep square
over the wicket, full outside off, defended to cover
was that a chance to short leg? Short on the hip, he works it away and it's probably just in front of Latham
length ball outside off, Smith is right across the crease and defends
full outside off, 123kph, hint of wobble away, left alone
left alone outside off
touch fuller, nice shape away, Labuschagne watches closely and lets it go through
keeps it hung outside off, he walks across the crease but doesn't play at it
and again, almost an action replay
wider outside off, Watling has some more work to end a quiet over
round the wicket, full at off stump, pushed to mid-off
defended on the front foot
touch shorter, he plays back and pushes to the off side
fuller, angled in at off stump, he gets a good stride forward
back and across, defends from off stump back to the bowler
tossed up very full and much wider, Smith takes advantage with a square drive through point...big chance towards the rope, it's flicked back but they run four anyway
gets across the crease and tucks a straight delivery off the pads backward of square
full outside off, defended
wider outside off, left alone
even wider outside off, getting close to being called with this one
another one floats through to the keeper
very wide outside off, that must have been close to a wide but he gets away with it
fractionally short on off, he's back to give room to cut just past backward point
short drag down and he's back to smash this over the midwicket rope! Terrible delivery and Labuschagne could not have been happier to whack this over the rope
fuller but he's back to work it to leg but short leg is in the way
short again and he pulls this along the ground square of midwicket, doesn't time it as well, gets three
good length, slow turn, he's back and tucking this to short leg
skipping down and lofting this over sightscreen! Lovely footwork. He was out so quickly and lofting on the up hitting straight the the line. It went just left of the sightscreen
123kph, good length outswinger wide of off, he leaves
122kph, floated up on off, he whips to midwicket and Blundell makes a diving save top prevent any extra runs
124kph, wider outswinger, he defends prodding away from his body
120kph shorter and wider of off, he's back and defending
good length, some swing, he's squared up in defence
121kph, good length outswinger wide of off, he leaves
131kph, angled into off, he clips this off the stumps to the gap forward of square
132kph, good length wide of off, he leaves
133kph, good length wide of off, he is happy to leave
131kph, good length, shaping back in the air, he defends under his eyes
135kph, fuller, and swinging in, he defends firmly to mid on
good length, 135kph, fifth stump line, he defends on the front foot
123kph, good length outswinger, he defends on the front foot
121kph, fuller outside off, he mistimes a drive to cover
leading edge trying to work to leg, it comes off the back of the bat but runs safely fine of gully
122kph, beats him with a good length outswinger well wide of off
121kph, good length wide of off, swinging away, he leaves
123kph, good length outswinger, he leaves wide of off
132kph, good length, hint of shape back to off, he defends on the front foot
huge lbw appeal, not out says Umpire Erasmus. No review. This swung back down the line but it looked high as he shuffled across
genuine edge from a loose drive flies between floating slip and gully! Got lucky there. A 5th consecutive score of 50 plus in Tests now for Labuschagne. Incredible consistency
fuller on off, he drives back to the bowler
136kph, back of a length, fourth stump, he's back and across to defend
good length angled across, 131kph, he leaves
good length, he's back and squared up but it runs to a gap at cover-point
edged through second! 123kph, late outswinger, he was lured into a drive, gets a genuine nick and there's no second in place!
123kph, fuller on leg, he pushes a drive in the air but safely wide of mid on
126kph, back of a length, he pads up, New Zealand appeal for lbw but it's too high. Hit him on the back thigh pad
good length, 125kph, outswinger wide of off, he leaves
122kph, good length outswinger but way wide of off, he leaves
135kph, full and angled wide, he places a square drive through backward point
130kph, back of a length, on a fourth stump line, he's back and defending
131kph, fuller outside off, he drives neatly to mid off who is deep and they get one
135kph, short and wide, he waits and plays a delightful controlled cut shot past backward point! He used the pace and the angle to place it into the gap
129kph, back of a length, fifth stump line, he's back and defending to point
134kph, fuller but shaping down the leg side
fuller on middle, he works this off the pads to midwicket
123kph, fuller but pushed down the leg side
122kph, fuller on off, he drives and it's in the air for a little way but short of mid on
120kph, good length, wide of off, he leaves
121kph, back of a length on off, he is back and defending off thick edge to gully
124kph, good length outswinger, he is back and defending
135kph, fuller swinging into the pads but hits him outside leg and rolls off the pad for a leg bye
133kph, chest high short ball and he cracks a pull shot along the ground through square leg! Text book pull shot out of the screws
132kph, back of a length on off, he's back and across and defending
134kph, fuller and wider, angled across, he leaves
good length, angled across, he leaves
137kph, fuller outside off, he drives firmly to mid off
124kph, good length outswinger, outside off, he leaves
121kph, fuller outside off, he defends off a thick outside edge towards point
123kph, good length on off, he defends on the front foot
123kph, good length, fuller outswinger, he leaves

bowled off the elbow as he was leaving! Unbelievable! Good length outside off, he leaves but this bounced a lot higher than expected, it comes of his right elbow as he was leaving it and ricochets onto off stump!
124kph, good length wide of off, he leaves
132kph, good length angled across, he leaves
132kph, good length swinging into middle, he clips this neatly behind square
136kph, angled into leg stump, he glances this fine to fine leg
134kph, good length on off, shaping in a touch, he pushes firmly to mid on
134kph, back of a length, on off, he tucks this off the stumps behind square
137kph, good length, fourth stump, he leaves
fuller on off, he drives to mid on
122kph, fuller outswinger, wide of off, he leaves
121kph, back of a length on off, he's back and working this neatly to fine leg
123kph, fuller angled in, he drives to cover
back of a length on middle, he's back and tucking this to fine leg
122kph, good length, wide of off, he leaves
bouncer, over leg, he ducks
129kph, good length, top of off, he's defending on the front foot
129kph, good length outswinger wide of off, he leaves
129kph, bouncer, over leg, he ducks
132kph, cracking bouncer, he ducks and turns his head
132kph, short ball angled down leg, he withdraws the hands and doesn't play
shorter length, he's back and working this to forward square with ease
tossed up, wider, drifting away, he leaves
shorter and wider, he's back and cutting to deep point
looped up, drifting into off, he reaches out and defends
fuller outside off, he drives to cover
88kph, drifting in, he yorks himself, jamming it out
134kph, back of a length on off, he stands up and defends with the full face
134kph, short ball and it strikes him on the chest! He just lifted the arms and copped it on the pec and then stared down Wagner!
fuller wider of off, he leaves
134kph, fuller, tight to off, nipping back, he makes a tight but good leave

comes off body and it flies between the keeper and slip! It's given as runs! He didn't hit it. It was short jagging back, beat the inside edge, came off the back thigh but neither Watling or Taylor moved.
Bouncer, over middle, he ducks
good length outside off, hint of away swing, left alone...New Zealand have found a bit of movement throughout
touch fuller, Smith shuffles across and leaves alone
terrific shot, latches on with an on-drive, takes the ball from outside off straight down the ground
edged! Just through gully. That certainly wasn't convincing. Full at the stumps, straightened a touch, takes an outside edge as he aims to the leg side, went to ground pretty quickly
full outside off, left alone
comes forward, drives wide of a diving cover and far enough from mid-off to allow him through for his fifty
short, angled across outside off, left alone
on leg stump, tucked off the hip to long leg
a bouncer on off stump, Wade goes underneath and turns his head away from the ball
short of a length, 131kph, defended on the back foot towards short leg
back of a length on off stump, 129kph, defended
gets across inside the line, works it off his hip towards leg gully
good length on off stump, defended
left alone outside off
nice full length outside off, Smith moving across his crease and leaves alone
well bowled! Gets squared up by a good-length delivery outside off, takes a thick outside edge wide of second slip. Smith turned completely inside out
this one is a fraction wider and he has no interest in playing
full at off stump, 130kph, driven to mid-on
good length outside off, left alone
just short of leg gully! Angled into the pads, Wade flicks it firmly off his hip and is not far from picking out Southee around the corner
ducks underneath a bouncer
a slower ball, 106kph, wide outside off, Wade thrashes a drive but it's well cut off by a diving mid-off
short outside leg stump, Smith moves inside the line
short of a length outside off, defended to cover
beats the edge! Comes round the wicket, in the channel outside off, comes back in then straightens off the seam. A cracker
touch fuller, squirts off a thick outside through gully as he gets squared up
he's more confidently forward into this one, defends towards gully
that will make him feel better, overpitched outside off, driven firmly straight down the ground
good length angling in at off stump, defended
gets forward and pushes square into the off side
beaten! Lovely delivery from Wagner, full outside off, swings away and pretty sure Wade only withdrew the bat after the ball had gone past him
this one holds its line outside off, on a full length, through to Watling
comes forward, drives down the on side without much timing
short of a length, angled in at middle and leg, takes the thigh pad
a bouncer which just slides down the leg side
takes a blow! He's ducking into the short ball and it flies down to fine leg off the back of the helmet by the looks of it. Wagner checks he's okay
round the wicket, short on leg stump, pulled to leg gully
short again, plays back and nudges to the leg side
131kph, wider down the leg side, left alone
short of a length outside off, Smith pushes into the off side but isn't too impressed with his effort
a bouncer on leg stump, he allows it to travel over his back
full outside leg, clipped off the pads to square leg
full outside off, driven to mid-off
good length outside off, left alone
back of a length at off stump, defended into midwicket
goes underneath a bouncer
full outside off, he's forward and across the crease, driven to cover
another bouncer to end the over, he allows it to go through
staying round the wicket, full at leg stump, defended to midwicket
short at the body, about chest height, pulls out to deep square leg
beaten on the drive! So close for Southee. Pushed it up full outside off, brought Wade into the drive away from his body
similar spot outside off, leaves it alone this time
gets a good stride forward into this one and plays to point
short of a length outside off, defended on his toes
over the wicket, full outside off, left alone
glanced just wide of Watling, but it's given leg byes...Smith got a long way across his stumps, clipped the thigh guard and wasn't that far from leg stump
back outside off, left alone
pushed across outside off
good line, 135kph, full outside off, left alone
he's right across outside off stump to defend a back-of-a-length delivery
round the wicket, tucks a straight delivery behind square
full outside off, he's still getting some movement away in the air, left alone
defends on the walk into the off side
short of a length, he has plenty of time to play back and across then tuck the ball to deep square
back of a length, straight, worked to long leg
full at the stumps, defended
back of a length at off stump, 134kph, defended
wide outside off, left alone
full and straight, he's right in front of all three as he flicks this backward of square

good length, straight, played into the on side
full at middle and off, defended into midwicket as Smith gets into one of this unique positions that makes you wonder how he does it
short outside off, a rare poor ball, square drives through the covers
wide outside off, left alone
played off the pads into midwicket
full outside off, Smith not tempting into having a dip
he ends up well outside off stump as he pushes this to mid-off
short of a length, straight, nudged into the leg side so he keeps the strike
starts with a drag down but only costs a single as he pulls to deep square
worked off the pads to short fine leg
nice footwork as he comes down the pitch and drives through the covers
angled in at the pads, worked around the corner
back of a length outside off, square drives behind point to bring up Australia's 200
played into the off side
full outside off, this comes back considerably on the angle as Wade leaves it alone
strides forward and drives to cover
beaten! That's a terrific delivery, Wade feeling for it outside off, back of a length and angles back plus some extra bounce
more confidently forward into this one, drives to cover
full outside off, left alone
comes right across outside off and down the pitch, drives into the off side
very full, clipped to mid-on who is deep enough for the single
round the wicket, full and straight, defended
full, driven into the off side
full at middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
full at off stump, driven into the off-side ring
shorter, he goes back and across to defend
beaten on the drive...again! Full outside off, a booming shot from Wade and it's nearly the nick they want
wider outside off, left alone
well, he's walked so far across the crease this time he's almost off the pitch by the time he blocks it
more conventional this time, full outside off, left alone

edged, but doesn't carry! Oh, the agony for New Zealand. Full outside off, he goes for the drive again, it's a healthy edge but falls just in front of Taylor at first slip. Oh, well, replays showed it was a no-ball as well!
left alone outside off
over the wicket, full and straight, clipped sweetly wide of mid-on
a bouncer, he ducks
over slip this time! Short of a length outside off, Wade trying to guide this down to third man, doesn't even try to keep it down, gets just enough to clear Taylor
top shot, full outside off, driven strongly through the covers...that's one of the best he's played today
short over leg stump, lets it go through
goes underneath another short ball
120kph, good length, wide and shaping back but it was wide enough to leave
120kph, thick inside edge trying to force off the back foot, it misses off stump by some margin, runs to fine leg, Wagner dives on the rope but can't keep it in

caught behind! Finally. He deserved that. 122kph, wobbling outside off, he was tempted to drive but he was playing for inswing, it just hit the seam and nipped away, got a thin edge that carried nicely to Watling. Nice reward for CdG. He's bowled well
123kph, horror ball wide of off, it must have slipped out! Barely hit the cut strip
123kph, floated up wide of off, shaping back but he can leave it
122kph, full and pushed wide of off, no shape, he leaves
122kph, back of a length, wide of off, he's back and making a late decision to leave
130kph, shorter length, fourth stump, he's back and defending to cover
128kph chest high short ball, he steps across and paddles a pull with control to leg gully on the bounce
130kph, bouncer over off, he ducks under it
108kph, knuckle ball slower ball, shapes in, he waits and clips to the left of forward square who makes a diving save
134kph, length ball down leg, he steps inside to leave
135kph, good length, but way down leg, he leaves
good length, on off, he's back and tucking this behind square
121kph, good length, wide of off, he leaves
121kph, good length, shaping back but wide enough to leave
120kph, good length, wide of off, no shape, he leaves
119kph, good length, wide of off, Head is not tempted
120kph, good length, angled in, fourth stump line, he makes a tight leave
129kph, back of a length on off, he's back and tucking this to square leg
132kph, back of a length, angled across, he's back and defending to point
132kph, short ball, he raises his arms and lets it hit him in the chest
133kph, short ball down leg, he steps inside it and leaves
130kph, back of a length, he's back and tucking this to square leg neatly
132kph, full on leg stump, he clips this neatly to mid on
123kph, length ball on leg stump, he clips this easily off the pads behind square
121kph, fuller, he mistimes a drive back to the bowler
120kph, shorter length angled into middle, he clips this behind square to the man in the deep
122kph, fuller outswinger, he slices a drive to cover-point
120kph, back of a length outswinger, wide of off, he leaves
121kph, good length outswinger way wide of off, he leaves again with little interest
131kph, shorter length down leg, he tried to glance but just missed! That could've easily come off glove
133kph, shorter into the ribs, he's jumping back and defending to short leg
133kph, back of a length, on middle, he's jumping back and working this to the fielder at a square midwicket
106kph, slower ball, full and shaping away, he checks a drive to mid off
133kph, back of a length outside off, he's punching off the back foot to wide mid off
129kph, shorter length on off, he's jumping back awkwardly and works it down behind square safely to wide fine leg
full on off, he drives to mid on who is deep and they get one
beaten on the back foot by one that turned and bounced! Watling couldn't glove it. They steal a bye
short and wide, he's back and slapping this firmly through cover-point, the sweeper has a long chase from backward point
fuller sliding into the thigh pad of Smith
fuller outside off, he plays back and defends with soft hands
drifting into off, nice length, he reaches forward and defends
128kph, good length, fifth stump line, some swing, he leaves
129kph, very full swinging back down the line, he slices across it trying to drive
129kph, angled down leg, way down leg
132kph, good length outswinger, he defends with soft hands to a gap at point and they pinch a single
130kph, back of a length angled across, climbing, he leaves
132kph, fuller angled across wider, he leaves again
128kph, fuller shaping into off, he defends on the front foot pushing firmly to mid off
129kph full swinging into off, he thumps an excellent punched drives straight back past Southee! Just a bottom hand jab and he middled it
130kph, full, angled across, he crunches a check drive straight to cover
128kph play and miss driving on the up at one that seamed away. He was playing for swing but this was the cross seam cutter
130kph, back of a length wide of off, he leaves
130kph, full and pushed way wide of off
135kph, back of a length, angled across, he nearly plays but he withdraws the bat late
133kph, back of a length fourth stump line, he defends on the back foot
129kph, back of a length down leg, he steps inside the line and elects not to play

138kph, back of a length, angled across, he leaves
good length, shaping in a touch on a fourth stump line, he's back and across and defending
129kph back of a length wide of off, he is back and leaving

130kph, short and wide, he hammers a cut shot and Santner makes a superb diving save at point. Saves four
132kph, full and shaping into off, he whips this off the stumps through forward square
fuller outside off, 130kph, he leaves this alone
129kph, back of a length wide of off, he leaves again
bouncer, over middle, he shapes to pull but bails out
good length, angled wide of off, he leaves
136kph, angled way down the leg side, Watling dives full length to knock it down
136kph, length ball, straight, he's back and tucking this through square leg
134kph, back of a length wide of off, shaping away, he's back and forcing away from his body to point
132kph, full but too straight, he clips this neatly behind square for a couple
128kph, good length outswinger, wide of off, he's happy to leave

130kph, good length, shaping wide of off, he leaves
129kph good length wide of off, he leaves comfortably again
128kph, good length, wide of off, he isn't tempted to play

fuller on middle, he clips this behind square
134kph, back of a length outside off, he leaves extravagantly to get the hands high above his head
back of a length on off, he's back and across and defending
back of a length wide of off, he's back and pushing away from his body to gully
134kph, leading edge trying to work against the swing into the leg side, it slices in the air but short of mid off
136kph, back of a length on off, he's jumping back to defend
129kph, back of a length on middle, he is back and defending
130kph good length outswinger, catches the edge but his soft hands ensure it falls well short of Taylor at slip
129kph, good length outswinger, fourth stump line, he's squared up a touch defending
130kph, wide of the crease, angled into a fifth stump line, he's back and defending
128kph, fuller angled into leg, he pushes out in front of his pad to mid on
125kph, good length wide of off, he leaves and this dies on the way to Watling
133kph, short and wide, Head loves these and he thrashes a cut shot behind point! He will smash those all day
134kph, fuller angled straighter, it catches the pad but it was sliding well down leg
132kph, bouncer, outside off, he leans back and drops the hands to get under it
134kph, good length but wide of off, he's happy to watch it go past
134kph, good length, fifth stump line, he leaves again

very full outside off, 128kph, driven to mid-off

the first bouncer of the day to Smith, he goes underneath
full outside off, he's across the crease and defends
works a straight ball down to long leg

full outside off, driven to mid-on

pushed down the leg side, Smith gets inside the line and doesn't play

round the wicket, full at off stump, driven to mid-off
gets across to off stump and defends with bat and pad together
length ball on the pads, worked into square leg
full at the stumps, 131kph, punched firmly to mid-on

full outside off, comes forward and drives to cover

round the wicket, keeps pounding the middle of the pitch, defended under his eyes

closer to off stump, left alone

goes for the yorker, it's on target at 126kph, Smith keeps it out
full and straight, driven to mid-off
a bouncer over middle and off, lets it go past his chest
full at off stump, defended on the front foot
comes round the wicket, short at the hip, he plays at it and flicks it in the air wide of leg gully

a bouncer which pitches outside leg stump and goes over his back
another bouncer, this one isn't quite as short, Smith has to crouch down to get under this one
short of a length, straight, worked to midwicket

gets into a tangle with this one! It's short, but not quite as short as Smith first thought, he turns his head and it smashes into his gloves but falls down by his feet. He almost caught this as it cannoned into his chest.
full outside off, driven to mid-off
dispatched! Dragged down short and wide outside off, poor ball, slashed away in front of point. First boundary of the day
better delivery, full at off stump, hint of swing and it's driven to deep point
good length outside off, defended
pushed across outside off, left alone
drives a full ball to cover
round the wicket, short on leg stump, 135kph, jumps across and defends to the leg side
that's what he's aiming for, short outside leg, Head flicks at it but the ball goes fine of leg gully
ducks underneath the bouncer
full, at the stumps, defended

tucked off the pads to leg gully
round the wicket, back of a length outside off, defended to cover

130kph, bouncer, over middle, he just sways inside the line. That was a good one
128kph, bouncer, over leg, he ducks inside the line this time

caught in the gully! A one hander from Nicholls and the bouncer does the trick! This was a brute of a bumper, he tried to ride it defending but it go big on him, it ballooned off the handle of the bat and the glove, flies high over gully, Nicholls jumps up and reaches back with the right hand and hangs on in the fingers. Great catch
135kph, wide full toss and he misses trying to drive. It just tailed late across him
133kph, good length on middle, he defends to midwicket

this rears from back of a length, he jumps up and defends off the sticker of the bat! He did well to keep it down
130kph, short ball on off, he defends on the back foot
130kph, short and he pulls neatly with control behind square, Boult has a long chase from fine leg and he just reeled it in! Skilful save. That was millimetres from the rope
138kph, short ball into the arm pit, he jumps up and fends it down just shy of short leg
133kph, back of a length angled into off, he's back and working this past short leg
131kph beaten by a short ball that climbs past the gloves! There's half an appeal for caught behind and a roar from the fans but he missed it
130kph, short down leg, he swivels on the pull shot, roping it down to fine leg

magnificent cover drive! 132kph wide half volley, he got a great stride out and flushed the cover drive. Glorious stroke
139kph, full on leg, he clips this very nicely wide of mid on, good timing and placement, they pick up three
138kph, fuller length tailing into off, he's back and defending infront of the stumps

119kph, good length, wobbling in and away, he defends on the move forward
122kph, fuller on off, he walks out and pushes forward to mid off
119kph, back of a length, fifth stump, he's back and defending away from his body
120kph, good length wider of off, he leaves

106kph, slower ball, fuller outside off, he drives to mid off
131kph, good length, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot and looks for one but wisely says no

128kph, bouncer, over off, he ducks well

111kph, good length, wide of off, he leaves

121kph, good length way wide of off, he shows no interest in playing

121kph, back of a length, fourth stump, he's squared up off the back foot but defends
119kph, back of a length on off, he's back and across and knocking it neatly behind square
118kph, length ball angled across, he's back and punching this to deep point
full on off, he drives to mid on
81kph, angled into leg, he's back and working it behind square
drifting in, good length, spinning and bouncing, he leaves
fuller drifting into off, he defends on the front foot

good length fourth stump, he defends on the front foot

good length, some spin and bounce and he defends on the front foot from the crease

short on leg, he pulls around the corner fine and they get two more
round the wicket, touch short, tapped to the on side
dragged down short, pulled backward of square and that takes Head to 1000 Test runs
that's better! Gets this fuller at off stump, straightens very nicely to beat the edge
full at off stump, driven wide of cover
round the wicket, short again, pulled to deep square leg
full at off stump, defended on the front foot
full outside off, hint of shape, left alone
nicely forward into a full delivery and drives to mid-off
plays slightly across this one and sends it to mid-on
keeps it full at off stump, 125kph, driven back to the bowler
wider on the crease, good length at off stump, defended
tucks a straight ball to the on side

fuller, he still plays back

short outside off, sways out of the line

drags the length back a touch, outside off, left alone

drifting into off, nice delivery, he stretches forward to defend
darted into leg stump, he's back and working this off the pads to the gap at square leg
good length wide of off, he's back and jabbing this behind point
shorter length, he stands up and punches this to cover
128kph, short ball into the ribs, he just cops it on the arm!
129kph, short ball rising on off, he stands tall and rises with it to defend
127kph, bouncer, over leg and called wide for being too high
109kph, fuller on off, slower ball, he defends
111kph slower ball short ball down leg, he swivels and pulls it down to fine leg with control
130kph, short ball, he pulls from high to low, getting it along the ground behind square to the sweeper
130kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and pushing this behind point for a single
tossed up, he drives beautifully inside out past mid off! Sensational timing and placement
looped up outside off, he drives firmly to cover
flatter outside off, he's back and defending to a gap at cover-point
looped up outside off, he drives wide of cover
flatter on off, he's back and defending
shorter length, he's back and leaving, this bounced a touch as he watched it go to Watling
128kph, bouncer, over off, he ducks under it
129kph, short outside off, he pulls forward of square but picks out the fielder
131kph, short into the ribs, he's cramped but controls a pull straight to backward square
he charges early at a 128kph bouncer and it just flies over his head!
131kph, length ball into the thigh pad, he just lets it hit him
114kph, slower ball, outside off, he's back and pushing this to a gap at cover
drifting into leg, he defends on the front foot
tossed up on off, he pushes this to cover
shorter length, he's back and cutting to deep cover-point
shorter length, he's back and forcing this to cover
floated up at 88kph, he defends to cover's right and they take an easy one
drifting into leg, he just taps this to the right of midwicket
130kph bouncer over off, he ducks under it
130kph, shorter outside off, he's back and defending away from his body knocking it down
134kph, bouncer angled in, he sits back and ducks early
135kph, shorter outside off, he forces off the back foot to cover-point
133kph, bouncer angled in, he hooks in the air but doesn't nail it so it falls short of fine leg
132kph, angled into leg, he jumps back and across and it just flicks the thigh guard and runs for four leg byes!
good length, on off, he's back and defending
fuller, drifting in, outside off, he steps out to defend
looped slower outside off, he pushes it to the gap at cover-point
short and wide, he tries to cut but mistimes it, chopping into the off side
flatter on off, he's back and defending
shorter, bouncer a touch, he's back and glancing this fine but can't find the gap
126kph, back of a length fourth stump, he's back and defending solidly
129kph, over-pitched, he checks a straight drive past the stumps, nice stroke but didn't middle it, good chase hauls it in
131kph, short into the hip, he swivels and pulls along the deck to wide fine leg
135kph, angled into off, he defends from the crease with the full face
132kph, good length, top of off, he defends on the front foot on the move
132kph, length ball wide, he chops a square drive to backward point, he wants one but Paine wisely sends him back as Nicholls closed in from gully
drifting into off, he defends on the front foot
drifting into middle, he pushes this firmly to long on
short and wide, he's back and hammering a cut to deep point
tossed up outside off, he defends from the crease
fuller and wider, he plays a fluent cover drive to the man in the deep
90kph, pushed through on middle, he gets an inside edge onto pad and it rolls behind square. Actually did he hit it? Santner appealed but no one went with him
136kph, angled into middle, he clips this to mid on
135kph, good length wide of off, he leaves this on the front foot
137kph, good length, he defends on the front foot into the off side, they call for a tight one, Head is stretched but he gets home
136kph, cracking bouncer! He jumps to play and then drops the gloves late and sways his head back. That took off
137kph, fuller on middle, he's working this to mid on
136kph, another lifter, again he jumps up and fends away awkwardly but he knocked it down
very full drifting in, he digs out a drive wide of cover for a single
drifting away and no spin, he plays for turn, gets an edge but it runs fine for a couple with no slip in
flatter and shorter, he's back and forcing to mid on
fired in quicker, on off, he's back and defending
shorter and slower, he's back and cutting firmly to deep cover-point
tossed up outside off, he defends from the crease
134kph, fuller on off, angled in, he clips this to midwicket
137kph, good length, top of off, he defends off the back foot to mid on
138kph, fuller on off, he checks a drive firmly to cover
shorter length, 133kph, on middle, he's back and working this behind square to the man in the deep
134kph, bouncer, over off, too high apparently. Boult was perplexed
132kph, back of a length, outside off, he's back and defending
113kph, swinging slower ball, going down leg, it clips the pad and runs fine to the rope for four extras
he skips down and drives to mid on who is now halfway to the rope
shorter on middle, he's back and defending this close on the leg side, they look at each other and sprint a single. Good running
shorter and wider, he's back and late cutting to short third man
flatter on off, he defends on the front foot
shorter, this bites and bounces, he's back and defending
shorter length on off, he gives room to cut to deep cover-point
133kph, back of a length on off, he's back and squared up, but he defends
back of a length, 132kph, on off, he's back and pinging this straight to midwicket! He timed that well but found the fielder
135kph, good length outswinger, he's back and slicing this to gully and Nicholls jumps up to field it
131kph, back of a length on off, he's back and working this to midwicket
129kph, good length on off, he works this to midwicket and Latham makes the save
136kph, fuller outside off, he's back and forced to defend!
round the wicket, full and straight, clipped to long-on
taps into the off side to take him to 99
straight delivery, nudged to the on side
full at off stump, pushed firmly to mid-off
slash and a misses outside off, beats the top edge
sharp single as he drive to mid-off, so Head will take wait a little longer...brings up the 150 stand

big appeal for lbw, and out on the DRS! Erasmus said not out and Williamson calls for the review. A good length ball from round the wicket, shapes in, takes him on the knee roll, looks to be outside the line. Well, it's not! It's three reds and Paine is gone.
the double bluff? Goes very full first ball, but pushes it down the leg side
straight full toss, clipped to long leg so Head gets the strike back
a slower ball comes out as big full toss! Head defends, taken a little by surprise
full, wide outside off, dabbed towards slip where it's cut off
oh, picks out square leg! It was a full outside leg, could almost have put that anywhere on the leg side. His wait goes on
finds mid-off! Well, that plan didn't work from Australia. Round the wicket, a full delivery, he aims a big shot straight down the ground but it comes off the toe of the bat
full, very wide outside off, almost wide enough to be called...through to the keeper
there it is! Very full outside off, he drives and sends it through backward point. An MCG hundred for Travis Head. He takes off his helmet and salutes the crowd. Great moment for him
back of a length outside off, runs off an open face into backward point for a scampered single
full and wide, Pattinson plays a booming drive first ball...that's a fairly clear sign
lovely shot! Top order would be proud of that, gets into the front foot and drives elegantly through the covers

another big appeal for lbw as he comes right across the stumps, deflects off the pads to long leg and the review is called again. You can see leg stump, he's certainly a long way over. He's not hit it. This will be close. Umpire's call on clipping leg stump
full and straight, dug out to mid-on
gives himself a touch of room and flicks a full delivery to mid-on
a bouncer which he ducks under
very well played, short outside off, ramps this almost straight back over the keeper
hammered! He's into T20 mode now...steps away to leg and thrashes this wide of mid-off. Don't think Australia plan to be batting much longer
pulls a short ball to deep square
cut through backward point, New Zealand still throwing themselves around the field
good length, angles back in from round the wicket, chopped into the crease
full at off stump, driven to long-off
backs away outside and attempts to late cut a short delivery, goes over the top edge
crunches a pull to midwicket
a yorker at leg stump, Head again giving himself room and angles it to gully
taken at cover! A low full toss, again giving himself room, slices it in the air for a simple catch...some late rewards for Wagner
round the wicket, full outside off, driven to cover
drives again, very nicely to cover, but he's nearly run out as he sets off after a misfield
a bouncer which Cummins tries to ramp to third man while also bending out of the line
a straight, low full toss which he clips to midwicket
round the wicket, short of a length outside off, pulled handsomely over wide midwicket
length ball outside off, chopped into point
chipped to midwicket! A low full toss and all he can do is flick it in the air, Latham jumps to take it above his head
full outside off, defended solidly on the front foot
shorter, outside off, defended
full at the stumps, pushed to mid-on. So Wagner will have a chance for his fifth
terrific yorker! Pattinson does well to keep it out
low full toss, whipped off the pads to deep midwicket
round the wicket, full at off stump, driven to cover
angled in at the stumps, worked off the pads to deep square leg
ducks underneath a bouncer
a slower ball, full outside off, driven to cover who lets it through his grasp
taken at long leg...Wagner has a hand in the last wicket, but it's with a catch. A short ball from Southee, Lyon couldn't keep his hook down. Neat catch after a long time in the field
over-steps, 148kph, rocket at off stump, he's back and defending to mid on and they pinch a tight single
147kph, back of a length, fourth stump, he's back and defending the ball with the angle to gully
144kph, full on off, he gets a thick inside edge onto pad, it rolls away, he wanted one but there was no run there and was wisely sent back
length ball, 148kph, leg stump, he's back and working this nicely off the pads through midwicket. Huge applause for two
145kph, full, shaping into leg, he's staying balanced and clipping this neatly to the gap at midwicket
145kph, genuine swing but going too far, it runs off pad past short leg and away for two leg byes
play and miss as this is angled across, he drove hard, this flew to Paine and nearly knocked him over as he took it! That was quick.
137kph, banged in short, comes off the glove and pops up but short of Paine running in! That was so close to a carbon copy of his Perth dismissal
139kph, good length, angled across, he leaves confidently
139kph, good length top of off, he defends from the crease trying to press forward
142kph, good length wide of off, he leaves
141kph, good length, fourth stump line, he leaves on line and length
142kph, angled across fuller, he drives but misses. That wasn't there to drive. Beaten for pace
144kph, good length, angled wide of off, he leaves
148kph, very full on off, he drives mistiming it back to the bowler
148kph, back of a length wider, he's square driving off the back foot! Superb shot! A touch risky with the angle and pace but he backed himself and placed it backward of point
wow! 146kph, length ball bounces over Paine's head! Good length outside off, he leaves, it just took off and Paine had no chance to jump up and stop it! Goodness
147kph, good length, fourth stump, he presses forward and defends well
150kph, full down leg and he glances this fine! Excellent shot. Too straight and he was all over it, glancing it fine
141kph, back of a length on off, he's back and defending
142kph, fuller length on off, he defends on the front foot
144kph, bouncer, over off, he drops the knees and hands and sways inside it to let it pass
143kph, good length, this jags away sharply but he left it well
143kph, good length, wider of off, he leaves
143kph, good length, nipping back down the line, he's hit on the back thigh but it was going well over
145kph, good length wide of off, he leaves
147kph, good length, slanted across the right hander and he leaves
147kph, short and angled across, he's up on his toes and square driving through backward point picking the gap
147kph, fired down the leg side, didn't adjust for the left hander
145kph, good length top of off, he defends from the crease, with the angle to mid on
144kph, good length, off stump, he defends tentatively, half forward, pushing to mid off
144kph, good length, wide of off, he leaves
144kph, back of a length, bottom edge off the toe trying to force through the off side, it bounces to second slip
142kph, good length, fourth stump line, he's back and defending

caught behind! Loose shot. 146kph, fuller length, angled in, he was lured to drive hard but feet weren't there, it just nipped away, thin edge, easy catch for Paine. Cummins worked him over. Pushed him back and back and then offered up a drive and got his man
144kph, good length leg cutter wide of off, he leaves watchfully
141kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and working this off the open face past gully along the ground, trademark shot, they run well for three
144kph, fuller and wider, he's happy to leave
148kph, wide half volley, he drives and gets a thick edge just short of gully
146kph, back of a length angled across, he drops the hands and sways underneath it
144kph, bouncer, over off, too high and called wide
146kph, inswinging yorker and he digs it out so well. So calm
142kph, shorter outside off, he drops the knees and the hands to let it go
144kph, good length angled across, he is forward and defending well
141kph, good length angled in, he presses forward to defend
138kph, back of a length on off, he's back and defending
144kph, fuller length angled into off, he defends on the front foot
142kph, back of a length, over off, he raises the bat to leave on length
beaten on the inside edge! 139kph, good length jagging back going through the gate as he prodded but it was missing off
144kph, good length wide of off, he leaves
138kph, shorter length and rising outside off, he's up on his toes and defending to point
134kph, back of a length outside off, he pushes off the back foot and it runs to a gap behind point
142kph, back of a length fourth stump line, he leaves on length
141kph, fuller on middle, he works this from the crease to midwicket
141kph, good length, top of off, he defends from the crease
141kph, shorter into the hip, he's back and taken on the thigh pad as he tries to glance, they get a leg bye as it runs away
139kph, fuller, he drives neatly, not out of the middle but pushes it wide of mid off for a couple
141kph, back of a length fourth stump line, he leaves on length
good length, 143kph, fourth stump, it climbs and he leaves well
142kph, full toss, maybe an attempted yorker angled down the leg side
139kph, good length close to off, he leaves on length
beaten on the inside edge! 141kph, angled in, it seams and bounces through the gate and over off!
141kph. angled into off, he defends with soft hands off the thick inside edge behind square on the leg side
141kph, short ball, angled across, he sways inside it
141kph, shorter into the hip, beaten for pace, it comes off the thigh pad
back of a length, 139kph, climbing, he gets an inside edge onto body and it drops down
139kph, short into the ribs, he swivels on a pull shot to fine leg
140kph, back of a length nipping in, he's taken on the back thigh
141kph, over-pitched and he leans into a controlled check drive through cover point
140kph, good length, top of off, he's defending from the crease
142kph, he's taken high on the pad, an appeal but it's aborted. It was too high and angling down leg
144kph, beaten by a brute! Banged in short, angled in and seaming away. No one can hit that, he just put his bat up in hope and missed it
beaten again! 141kph, fuller length, he's caught on the crease, squared up, it nips away beating the edge
141kph, good length, wide of off, he leaves
144kph over-pitched and wide and he caresses a glorious square drive forward of point, it doesn't reach the rope but they run an easy four!

skied pull shot caught by Paine! New Zealand hearts sink as the Melbourne crowd roar for their man! Banged in short and wide outside off, 140kph, he took it on trying to pull forward of square but the bounce was too much to handle, got a top edge that flew high towards fine leg, Paine ran a long way, settled and took a good running catch
142kph, yorker length on off, he defends well digging  it out
141kph, good length on off, he defends on the front foot
back of a length, 140kph, well wide of off, he leaves watchfully
beaten by a beauty. 135kph, angled in, seaming away, squares him up and beats the edge
141kph, good length, fourth stump, he presses forward to defend off the sticker of the bat
141kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and pushing this neatly to cover for a single
141kph, short ball nips in and hits him in the chest! He tried to leave but it just honed in on the angle
139kph, back of a length, he tries to work to leg but is taken on the back thigh
139kph, beats him again, angling in and seaming away from back of a length. This is ridiculously good
141kph, fuller length on off, he closes the face and gets a leading edge but it rolls safely to point
143kph, length ball into middle, he clips this in the air and it hits Wade's shin at short leg! Hardly a chance. It was hit hard

Given LBW! Taylor reviews. He was trapped on the crease infront. This was a fuller length and nipping in. It hit above the knee roll but he was on the crease. Nothing on hot spot. Nothing on RTS. Ball tracking says going over! Too high! Not out. Great review.
143kph, attempted yorker speared down leg
138kph, good length, angled in and straightening, he's back and defending off a leading edge
140kph, back of a length and he's back and defending
137kph, bouncer, over off, he ducks under it
tossed up on off, he reaches forward and defends, gets an edge that runs fine of backward point
tossed up outside off, he reaches out and defends
looped up, spinning into off, he's back and defending
tossed up outside off, he drives against the turn to mid off
looped up, outside off, he defends from the crease
92kph, pushed through wide of off, he leaves this on the back foot
139kph, low full toss, he drives straight to cover
135kph, back of a length, fourth stump, he makes a late decision to leave on length
135kph, back of a length wide of off, he leaves again
134kph, back of a length on off, he's back and working this behind square for a couple
133kph, back of a length, wide of off, he's leaving this on length
135kph, fuller and wide of off, sixth stump line, he leaves
92kph off break on off, he defends from the crease
shorter length, some turn, he's taken high on the pad
shorter length, he's back and working this on the bounce to short leg
shorter length, he's right back on the stumps and working across the line to short leg
tossed up higher, he defends from the crease
tossed high wide of off, he drives, mistiming it wide of mid off for a single
full outside off, 132kph, comes forward and plays to cover
fuller, at off stump, pushed back to the bowler
back of a length at off stump, 137kph, defended
comes forward and squeezes a full deliver to the right of mid-off
round the wicket straightaway to Latham and he's beaten outside off, a good length angled in then nipping away

appealing for a lot of things, is this caught in the gully?! The time for a review has run out. Back of a length, nips back into the top of the pad, too high for lbw but it's caught by Warner. Replay shows there's no edge. Excellent decision all round by Erasmus
short of a length, 139kph, hammers into the thigh pad
touch fuller, at off stump, straightens off the seam and beats the edge, takes Taylor high on the back leg
beaten outside off! This is a fantastic start from Australia. In the channel, draws Taylor forward and it scoots past the edge
short of a length, straight, worked down to fine leg as he takes the bottom hand off the bat
over the wicket, good length at off stump, defended
beats the edge again! Short of a length, angled across, Latham pushing away from his body. Plenty of chirp from behind the stumps

taken on the rebound from third to first slip! Full outside off, Taylor pushing forward, it's a think edge to third slip where Labuschagne can only parry it in the air, but the ball goes straight up in the air and Burns grabs it from first slip

gone first ball! Cummis is on fire, although Nicholls called the review. Round the wicket to the left hander, it's full and straight, Nicholls plays around it, taken on the knee roll. Will bounce save him? No, it won't! Umpire's call on hitting the top of leg stump
full at off stump! Defended to mid-on. Again, making him play
good length at off stump, 141kph, defended to the on side
a bouncer, 140kph, which keeps on climbing through to Paine who takes it one-handed above his head...called wide in the end
good shot, fuller outside off, gets onto the front foot and drives it straight of mid-off
full outside off, 141kph, left alone...some bowling from Cummins
slides past the bat! This is Test batting and its most demanding. Pitches on off stump, good length, and nips off the seam as Latham holds the line. Did well not to follow it
dropped at second slip! Steve Smith diving across in front of Burns at first. Full outsie off, 143kph, brings a drive from Latham and you would expect Smith to hold that. And it was Burns' catch
full on the pads, 139kph, clipped to long leg
full at off stump, 143kph, driven to mid-on
full outside off, 144kph, left alone
back of a length outside off, 140kph, carries to Paine at waist height
full outside off, onto the front foot and drives to mid-off
back of a length outside off, left alone
good length outside off, 142kph, left alone
fuller at off stump, 141kph, comes forward and pushes through the covers
beats the edge! Playing forward to a good length delivery outside off, not much carry on this one
onto the front foot and a confident drive to mid-off
full outside off, 144kph, defended to the on side
a short ball on off stump, 140kph, defended down awkwardly by his feet
full outside off, left alone
length ball outside off, 142kph, pushed to the covers
beats the drive! A tempting full length outside off, Latham eyes a big shot through the covers
full at off stump, driven straight down the ground
round the wicket, short outside off, knocked into the covers
full outside off, 139kph, left alone
doesn't carry into the slips! A short ball outside off, Watling tries to ride it...may have come off the back arm
nearly chops on! Full at off stump, Watling defends down into the crease and the ball bounces back near leg stump
full at off stump, 142kph, defended on the front foot
tight leave! Back of a length just outside off, 139kph, nips back a touch and it's a good job the carry was good
full at off stump, 143kph, driven into the covers and almost a mix-up in the running. Wouldn't have been a wise second

edged, taken at first slip! It's carnage out there. Short of a length at off stump, makes Watling play, the delivery rises to take the shoulder of the bat, and a touch of a glove, and it loops slowly to Burns. That was a brilliant delivery
short of a length, straight, worked off the hip behind square
short on off stump, Latham takes it on and pulls well in front of square
short of a length outside off, 135kph, de Grandhomme pushes at it and is beaten
fuller, nips back into the pads but is angling down the leg side
round the wicket, full outside off, left alone
full at off stump, defended to mid-off
a bouncer from round the wicket, he ducks underneath
good length at the stumps, 137kph, defended to mid-on
in the demanding channel outside off, makings him play, takes a thick outside edge towards gully
another edge! Goes to ground towards gully. A touch fuller, at middle and off, Latham is squared up
full, wide outside off, de Grandhomme tries to flay it through the off side with a booming drive
spooned towards mid-on! Back of a length, straight, the face closes as de Grandhomme pushes to the on side
back of a length, straight, nudged into square leg
good length, 141kph, angled across outside off, left alone
touch fuller, outside off, reaches Paine at his bootlaces
left on length! 140kph, back of a length at off stump, shapes back as Latham shoulders arms and is grateful this doesn't keep low
starts down the leg side
on leg stump, takes the pad towards short leg
gets the line onto off stump, back of a length, defended on the back foot
full and straight, inside edge saves him! de Grandhomme looking to flick it through the leg side
full at off stump, clipped strongly to mid-on
good length outside off, 142kph, defended towards point
129kph, short and wide, he cracks a cut to deep point
back of a length outside off, he pulls but mistimes it wide of mid on
132kph, wide of off, he late cuts beautifully and beats the diving deep point! It was a no ball too. Lovely timing
128kph, good length top of off, he's back and working this to mid on
132kph, fuller on off, he cracks a drive back to the bowler
130kph wide full toss and he slices a square drive behind point! Lots of loose stuff here. A gift after the unrelenting quality of the first hour
full on middle, he works this wide of mid on
139kph, good length, off stump, he defends from the crease to short leg who fields and flicks back at the stumps but CdG was home
141kph, back of a length on leg, it hits him on the thigh guard and drops down
144kph, back of a length wide of off, he checks a back foot drive to point
waft and miss off the back foot. 141kph, good length angled across and he just waved it with no footwork
beaten again. This was 143kph, across him and flying off a length! Again he tried to back foot drive but missed it comfortably
beaten a third time. 142kph, angled across, again he waves at it off the back foot and misses
90kph drifting down leg, he paddle sweeps nicely fine to pick up a boundary! Loose delivery and he cashes in
90kph, shorter on leg, he's back and defending with soft hands
skips down and yorks himself trying to work across the line, hit on the pad, they appeal but it's not out. He was a long way down
shorter outside off, some bounce, he's back and defending
fuller and quicker, he's back and defending
looped up on off, 89kph, he reaches out and defends on the front foot
very full on leg, he clips this powerfully off his toes to deep square
141kph, back of a length on off, he's jumping back and defending

overthrows. 143kph, good length on off, he defends off a thick inside edge, it bounces to Wade at short leg, Latham was out of his crease, Wade shied and missed, Latham was back anyway but no one is backing up
147kph, good length wide of off, he leaves
should have been run out! Lyon misses! A hit and run to point and de Grandhomme was nowhere. Lyon swooped from point, threw and missed. De Grandhomme was miles out
139kph, bouncer, over off, he ducks under it
140kph, shorter length, fourth stump, he defends away from his body to point
he skips down and works against the spin wide of mid on
91kph, good length, turning back to off, he defends
shorter length, he's back and working this past short leg with the turn
looped up outside off, he pushes this to mid off who is deep and they pinch a single
fuller on off, he works this with the spin to midwicket
looped up outside off, he reaches out to defend
142kph, bouncer wide of off, he drops the knees and sways away to leave
140kph, bouncer over leg, he ducks well
145kph, good length wider of off, he leaves on the back foot
143kph, back of a length on off, he's squared up jumping back but defends with the full face
142kph, good length, well wide of off, he leaves
143kph, back of a length, angled into the hip, he glances this to fine leg
beaten by a 93kph, off break, drifting in, pitching on off, spinning and bouncing past the edge as he defended playing back
skips down and drives beautifully straight of mid on! Great response. His footwork was crisp and the timing was even better. A short arm check drive.
shorter and wider, he's back and cutting fluently past backward point, long chase for Warner to haul it in
flatter on off, he's back and defending
tossed up outside off, 89kph, he works with the spin to midwicket
a heave and it just falls short of deep square! This was tossed up, he took a big swipe and dragged it with the spin but didn't hit it well enough to reach Burns in the deep

caught in the gully! That was inevitable. He had played and missed so often. 141kph, short of a length, angled across, he just pushed at it needlessly with no footwork, it pops off the shoulder of the bat and loops to Warner in the gully. Easy catch
144kph, back of a length wide of off, he leaves

an appeal for caught at leg gully! Given not out. Australia review. A brute of a bouncer from Starc. He just fended and ducked in hope. It balloon up off the arm guard and popped high to Head at leg gully. The question is did it touch the glove before hitting the arm guard. Very tough to tell. It may have hit the sweatband of the glove which counts as part of the glove. The third umpire is taking his time. Not enough evidence! The third umpire stays with Erasmus' decision!
another bouncer, he ducks underneath it
144kph, back of a length, short outside off, he half ducks, half sways
145kph, back of a length on leg, he's back and defending to mid on
tossed up on off, he reaches out and defends
pitching on leg, it grips, he's defending and closing the face, it comes off the leading edge but goes down
very full, he skips down and glances this fine to short fine leg
89kph, short and wide, it sits in the surface, he is back and cutting through cover. Didn't time it but gets two
good length turning away outside off, he leaves
tossed up wider, he leaves
140kph, back of a length on leg, he's working this off the hip past short leg
141kph, back of a length on off, he's back and defending to cover
141kph, back of a length on off, he's back and defending
length ball angled down leg, he opts to leave
141kph, bouncer, outside off, he drops the knees to get under it
142kph, back of a length on off, he's back and defending on off
tossed up on off, he defends on the front foot
tossed up on off, he defends nervously outside off
straight on middle, it bounces a touch, he defends with hard hands
95kph, beaten as this turned at pace outside off
looped up on off, slower, he defends to silly mid off
91kph, off break, pitching on a fourth stump line, he reaches out and smothers the spin
141kph, good length, fourth stump, he makes a tight but good leave
shorter into hip, 138kph, this comes off the thigh guard and runs to fine leg

140kph, short ball outside off, he is hopping around but drops the gloves inside it

tossed up on off, he slips down early and smothers it in defence
beaten going back to play, but it turned and bounced sharply!
looped up on off, he steps forward to defend
he skips down early to a length ball, it comes off pad and bat and squirts to cover for a single
almost strikes first ball! Round the wicket, full outside off, Latham plays forward and gets a thick inside edge past the stumps
full at off stump, 135kph, solidly defended this time
good length, at off stump, defended to backward point
a bouncer, 133kph, Latham ducks
short at the body, makes him play, he does well to tuck it down to long leg off his ribs
huge appeal for caught behind, given not out by Erasmus! Paine declines to review. Good length, angled in from round the wicket, beats the inside edge...grazed the pad. Excellent decision
over the wicket, back of a length, defended
fuller, outside off at 140kph, defended on the front foot
short of a length outside off, nicely over the bounce and guides it through backward point to take him to a very fine half-century off 135 balls
back of a length outside off, defended on the back foot to point
round the wicket, full outside off, his feet a little caught in the crease as he drives to mid-on
beaten! Back of a length outside off, Santner feels he has to play because of the angle into him
round the wicket, full outside off, that's a pretty tight leave
140kph, full outside off, through to the keeper
shorter in length at off stump, 139kph, on the back foot and defends
